articles.title: Yuvraj Singh's bombastic take on Suryakumar Yadav amid hat-trick of golden ducks - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Suryakumar Yadav's three consecutive golden ducks in the recently-concluded ODI series against Australia at home has created quite a big discussion over India's possible batting line-up for the upcoming 2023 World Cup. | Cricket
